text: Pen Klays apjakɨl, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak mɨdɨl gek, tap tep gup ak apjakup. Ne sel kal agnɨgep kɨdeyɨl mɨgan ak amɨl mɨdeb. Pen sel kal agnɨgep kɨdeyɨl anɨb ak, teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb, sel kal agnɨgep ned ak yokɨp yek. Kal kɨdeyɨl ak binɨb ma gɨlak, anɨb ak lum awl yɨl ak ma yɨbɨl mɨdeb.
